item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers

We have one Member who RSVPed Maybe,
That to me is the same as a RSVP No.
It is not worth it for me to drive all of the way to
Wallingford for a RSVP Maybe.

I will keep that Event there in case the Maybe does
Go to the Movie, but I am creating another Event
For me to drive to Milford that is a lot easier for me.

Due to lack of Meet Up interest,
As usual,
I am going to meet a friend in Milford at the Movie
In the Mall to watch Iron Man.

Do any of you enjoy going out to the movies?
I guess not.

We are going to see the movie Iron Man

Google Site for Iron Man

http://news.google.co...

news.google.com/news?hl=en&q=Iron+Man&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&oi=news_result&resnum=1&ct=title

Good Place for Movie Reviews

http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/

Since no one has been attending any Meet Ups lately, and
Because no one has suggested anything, I did not bother to create
Any other Meet Ups for today.

Mike B
Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: 7 pm in Milford. I will probably meet my guest in the food court down stairs.
item.why: Who wants to Meet Up at the Movies in Milford on a Sunday Night?
item.name: Coffee Talk Having a Marvelous Coffee - 5/11 in Milford Instead
